FeatureOption Class Reference

Class for managing a specific optional feature for a package (like USE flags in Gentoo's portage). More...

string mName
 The name of this optional feature.
bool mEnabled
 The state of whether this feature should be used by a package.

Detailed Description

Class for managing a specific optional feature for a package (like USE flags in Gentoo's portage).
